summary: Elizabeth, the star of a successful cooking show, is set to do a live show on Christmas, where she'll cook a Christmas dinner. But what no one knows is that she can't cook.
cast: Dyan Cannon|Kris Kristofferson|Tony Curtis|Richard Roundtree|Kelly Cinnante|Gene Lythgow|Jimmy Workman|Vivian Bonnell|David Arnott|Toni Attell|Jenee Bandler|Bob Braun|Sonny Carl Davis|Judy Forrester|Wendle Josepher|Peter Kent|Robert Machray|Robert Noble|Michael Potter|George Putnam|Mary Watson|David E. Harshbarger|John Michael Quinn|Arnold Schwarzenegger
keywords: christmas|tv star|neo screwball comedy|grand teton national park|color remake of black and white film
title: Navidades arriesgadas
